sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.cpf"
              label="CPF"
              :rules="[rules.required, rules.cpf]"
              outlined
              dense
              v-mask="'###.###.###-##'"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.name"
              label="Nome"
              :rules="[rules.required]"
              outlined
              dense
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.father_name"
              label="Nome do Pai"
              outlined
              dense
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.mother_name"
              label="Nome da Mãe"
              outlined
              dense
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.phone"
              label="Telefone"
              :rules="[rules.required, rules.phone]"
              outlined
              dense
              v-mask="'(##) #####-####'"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="12" md="6">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="record.email"
              label="Email"
              :rules="[rules.required, rules.email]"
              outlined
              dense
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" class="d-flex justify-end">
            <v-btn :disabled="!valid" color="success" @click="submit">Salvar</v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-form>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { useVuelidate } from '@vuelidate/core';
  import { VueTheMask } from 'vue-the-mask';
  
  export default {
    name: 'CreateRecord',
    directives: {
      mask: VueTheMask
    },
    data() {
      return {
        valid: true,
        record: {
          cpf: '',
          name: '',
          father_name: '',
          mother_name: '',
          phone: '',
          email: ''
        },
        rules: {
          required: value => !!value || 'Campo obrigatório.',
          email: value => /.+@.+\..+/.test(value) || 'E-mail deve ser válido.',
          cpf: value => /^\d{3}\.\d{3}\.\d{3}-\d{2}$/.test(value) || 'CPF deve ser válido.',
          phone: value => /^\(\d{2}\) \d{4,5}-\d{4}$/.test(value) || 'Telefone deve ser válido.',
        }
      };
    },
    setup() {
      return { v$: useVuelidate() };
    },
    methods: {
      submit() {
        // Implementar lógica para enviar dados ao backend
        console.log('Record:', this.record);
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style>
  /* Estilos adicionais, se necessário */
  </style>
